name: Lung Meridian
description: The Lung Meridian governs respiration and the skin. It controls the circulation of Qi and is associated with grief and sadness.

acupoints.name: Central Mansion
acupoints.location: Laterosuperior to the sternum 1 thumb width below LU2 at the level of the 1st intercostal space 6 thumb widths lateral to the anterior midline.
acupoints.anatomicalLocation: In the 1st intercostal space, 6 cun lateral to the anterior midline
acupoints.cautions: Avoid during pregnancy; contraindicated in cases of pneumothorax.

acupoints.name: Cloud Gate
acupoints.location: In the superior lateral part of the anterior thoracic wall superior to the coracoid process of the scapula in the depression of the infraclavicular fossa 6 thumb widths lateral to the anterior midline.
acupoints.anatomicalLocation: In the infraclavicular fossa, 6 cun lateral to the midline
acupoints.cautions: Avoid deep needling due to proximity to lungs and blood vessels; contraindicated in hemoptysis.

acupoints.name: Celestial Storehouse
acupoints.location: On the medial aspect of the upper arm 3 thumb widths below end of the axillary fold on the radial side of the biceps brachii.
acupoints.anatomicalLocation: 3 cun below the axillary fold, on radial side of biceps brachii
acupoints.cautions: Avoid deep needling; caution near brachial artery.

acupoints.name: Guarding White
acupoints.location: On the medial aspect of the upper arm 4 thumb widths below anterior end of the axillary fold or 5 thumb widths above the cubital crease on the radial side of the biceps brachii.
acupoints.anatomicalLocation: 4 cun below axillary fold, on radial side of biceps brachii
acupoints.cautions: Caution with depth to avoid damaging blood vessels.

acupoints.name: Cubit Marsh
acupoints.location: On the cubital crease in the depression of the radial side of the biceps brachii tendon; point is located with elbow slightly flexed.
acupoints.anatomicalLocation: At the cubital crease, on radial side of biceps brachii tendon
acupoints.cautions: Avoid in cases of severe vascular disease; caution with depth at cubital fossa.

acupoints.name: Collection Hole
acupoints.location: On the palmar aspect of the forearm on the line joining LU9 and LU5 7 thumb widths above the transverse crease of the wrist.
acupoints.anatomicalLocation: 7 cun above the wrist crease, on the line connecting LU5 and LU9
acupoints.cautions: Caution in cases of local inflammation or skin conditions.

acupoints.name: Interrupted Sequence
acupoints.location: Superior to the styloid process of the radius 1.5 thumb widths above the transverse crease of the wrist between brachioradialis and tendon of the abductor policis longus.
acupoints.anatomicalLocation: 1.5 cun above the wrist crease, above the styloid process of radius
acupoints.cautions: Use with caution in patients with radial nerve sensitivity.
acupoints.category: Luo-Connecting Point, Confluent Point of Ren Mai

acupoints.name: Channels Ditch
acupoints.location: 1 thumb width above the transverse crease of the wrist in the depression on the lateral side of the radial artery.
acupoints.anatomicalLocation: 1 cun above the wrist crease, on lateral side of radial artery
acupoints.cautions: Caution with depth; avoid radial artery.

acupoints.name: Great Source
acupoints.location: At the radial end of the transverse crease of the wrist in the depression on the lateral side of the radial artery.
acupoints.anatomicalLocation: On the wrist crease, on lateral side of radial artery
acupoints.cautions: Caution in patients with cardiac arrhythmias; avoid excessive stimulation.
acupoints.category: Shu-Stream Point, Yuan-Source Point, Earth Point, Hui-Meeting Point of Vessels

acupoints.name: Fish Border
acupoints.location: On the radial aspect of the midpoint of the 1st metacarpal bone on the junction of the red and white skin of the hand.
acupoints.anatomicalLocation: At midpoint of 1st metacarpal bone, on thenar eminence

acupoints.name: Lesser Metal
acupoints.location: On the radial side of the thumb about 0.1 thumb width posterior to the corner of the nail.
acupoints.anatomicalLocation: 0.1 cun from the corner of the thumbnail, on radial side
acupoints.cautions: Avoid in patients with bleeding disorders; caution with depth.
acupoints.needlingDepth: 0.1 cun shallow or prick to bleed
